percent_open_pipe.query: opp_history = load "${App.Datasets.pipeline_trending_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; today = filter opp_history by date('ValidToDate_Year', 'ValidToDate_Month', 'ValidToDate_Day') in ["1 day ahead"..]; today = foreach today generate sum('Amount') as 'Amount'; last_week = filter opp_history by date('ValidFromDate_Year', 'ValidFromDate_Month', 'ValidFromDate_Day') in [.."8 days ago"]; last_week = filter last_week by date('ValidToDate_Year', 'ValidToDate_Month', 'ValidToDate_Day') in ["7 days ago"..]; last_week = foreach last_week generate sum('Amount') as 'Amount'; s = group today by all full, last_week by all; s = foreach s generate (case when (coalesce(sum(last_week['Amount']), 0) == 0 && coalesce(sum(today['Amount']),0) > 0) then 1.0 else (coalesce(sum(today['Amount']),0) - coalesce(sum(last_week['Amount']),0)) / coalesce(sum(last_week['Amount']),1) end) as 'sum_percent';

query.pigql: f = load "${App.Datasets.forecasting_item_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; f = filter f by 'ForecastingType_DeveloperName' == "OpportunityRevenue"; h = filter f by {{column(manager_role.selection, ["UniqueUserName"]).asEquality("User_UniqueUserName")}}; final = group h by all; final = foreach final generate (case when ("{{cell(manager_role.selection, 0, "UniqueUserName").asString()}}" == "null") then 0 else coalesce(sum('AmountWithoutManagerAdjustment'),0) end) as'sum_ForecastAmount';

forecast_barchart.query: q = load "${App.Datasets.opportunity_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; q = filter q by 'IsLost' == "No"; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate sum('Amount') as 'sum_Amount', "Forecast No Adjustments" as 'Legend'; f = load "${App.Datasets.forecasting_item_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; f = foreach f generate {{coalesce(cell(kpi_forecast_adjustment.result, 0, "sum_ForecastAmount"), 0).asObject()}} as 'sum_Amount', "Forecast including Adjustments" as 'Legend'; u = union f, q;

team_details_table.query: opp_forecast = load "${App.Datasets.opportunity_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; closed = filter opp_forecast by 'IsWon' == "True"; opp_commit = filter opp_forecast by 'ForecastCategory' =="Forecast"; opp_bestcase =  filter opp_forecast by 'ForecastCategory' =="BestCase"; opp_pipeline = filter opp_forecast by 'ForecastCategory' == "Pipeline"; f = load "${App.Datasets.forecasting_item_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; f = filter f by 'ForecastingType_DeveloperName' == "OpportunityRevenue"; commit = filter f by 'ForecastingItemCategory' == "CommitOnly"; bestcase = filter f by 'ForecastingItemCategory' == "BestCaseOnly"; quota = load "${App.Datasets.quota_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; c = group opp_forecast by 'Owner_Role_RoleNames' left, commit by 'User_UniqueUserName' left, bestcase by 'User_UniqueUserName' left, quota by 'User_UniqueUserName' left, opp_commit by 'Owner_Role_RoleNames' left, closed by 'Owner_Role_RoleNames' left, opp_bestcase by 'Owner_Role_RoleNames' left, opp_pipeline by 'Owner_Role_RoleNames'; c = foreach c generate coalesce(opp_forecast['Owner_Role_RoleNames'], commit['User_UniqueUserName'], bestcase['User_UniqueUserName'], quota['User_UniqueUserName'], opp_commit['Owner_Role_RoleNames'], opp_bestcase['Owner_Role_RoleNames'], opp_pipeline['Owner_Role_RoleNames']) as 'UniqueUserName', (case when (coalesce(sum(quota['QuotaAmount']),0) - coalesce(sum(closed['Amount']),0)) > 0  then (coalesce(sum(quota['QuotaAmount']),0) - coalesce(sum(closed['Amount']),0)) else 0 end) as 'Quota Remaining', sum(closed['Amount']) as 'Won', sum(opp_commit['Amount']) as 'Commit', (case when ("{{cell(manager_role.selection, 0, "UniqueUserName").asString()}}" == "null") then 0 when first(commit['User_UniqueUserName']) in ["{{coalesce(column(manager_role.selection, ["UniqueUserName"]),"0").asObject()}}"]  then sum(commit['AmountWithoutManagerAdjustment']) else sum(commit['ForecastAmount']) end) as 'Adjusted Commit', sum(opp_bestcase['Amount']) as 'Best Case', (case when ("{{cell(manager_role.selection, 0, "UniqueUserName").asString()}}" == "null") then 0 when first(bestcase['User_UniqueUserName']) in ["{{coalesce(column(manager_role.selection, ["UniqueUserName"]),"0").asObject()}}"] then sum(bestcase['AmountWithoutManagerAdjustment']) else sum(bestcase['ForecastAmount']) end) as 'Adjusted Best Case', sum(opp_pipeline['Amount']) as 'Pipeline', sum(opp_forecast['Amount']) as 'Forecast';

query.pigql: q = load "${App.Datasets.opportunity_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; q = foreach q generate (case when ("{{cell(manager_role.selection, 0, "UniqueUserName").asString()}}" == "null") then "Please select a person for Adjusted Forecast to populate." when ("{{cell(manager_role.selection, 0, "UniqueUserName").asString()}}" != "null") then "Please note that adjusted forecasts may not be able to filter by Opportunity or Record Type and Opportunity Owner." else " " end) as 'list_text';

q = load "${App.Datasets.opportunity_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; q = group q by 'StageName'; q = foreach q generate 'StageName' as 'StageName', sum('Amount') as 'sum_Amount', max('Stage_SortOrder') as 'SortOrder'; q = order q by 'SortOrder';

q = load "${App.Datasets.opportunity_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate {{coalesce(cell(percent_open_pipe.result, 0, "sum_percent"), 0).asObject()}} as 'sum_percent'; q = foreach q generate (case when 'sum_percent' > 0 then "#4ED469" when 'sum_percent' < 0 then "#ED3251" else "#7D98B3" end) as 'color', 'sum_percent' as 'sum_percent';

a = load "${App.Datasets.opportunity_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; a = group a by ('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Week'); a = foreach a generate 'CloseDate_Year' + "~~~" + 'CloseDate_Week' as 'CloseDate_Year~~~CloseDate_Week', sum(sum('Amount')) over([.. 0] partition by all order by ('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Week')) as 'sum_Amount';

kpi_remaining_quota.query: a = load "${App.Datasets.opportunity_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; a = filter a by 'IsWon' == "True"; b = load "${App.Datasets.quota_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; c = group a by all full, b by all; c = foreach c generate sum(b['QuotaAmount']) as 'quota', coalesce(sum(a['Amount']), 0) as 'amount'; c = foreach c generate (case when sum('quota') - sum('amount') > 0 then sum('quota') - sum('amount') else 0 end) as 'quota_remaining';

kpi_open_pipe.query: q = load "${App.Datasets.opportunity_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate coalesce(sum('Amount'), 0) as 'sum_Amount';

kpi_pipe_coverage.query: won = load "${App.Datasets.opportunity_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; won = filter won by 'IsWon' == "True"; quota = load "${App.Datasets.quota_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; remaining_quota = group won by all full, quota by all; remaining_quota = foreach remaining_quota generate sum(quota['QuotaAmount']) as 'quota', coalesce(sum(won['Amount']), 0) as 'amount'; remaining_quota = foreach remaining_quota generate (case when sum('quota') - sum('amount') > 0 then sum('quota') - sum('amount') else 0 end) as 'remaining_quota'; open = load "${App.Datasets.opportunity_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; open = filter open by 'IsClosed' == "False"; coverage = group remaining_quota by all full, open by all; coverage = foreach coverage generate coalesce(sum(open['Amount']), 0) as 'amount', sum(remaining_quota['remaining_quota']) as 'remaining_quota'; coverage = foreach coverage generate round(coalesce(sum('amount') / sum('remaining_quota'), 0), 1) as 'sum_pipe_coverage'; f = filter coverage by 'sum_pipe_coverage' > 0;

kpi_quota_attainment.query: a = load "${App.Datasets.opportunity_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; a = filter a by 'IsWon' == "True"; b = load "${App.Datasets.quota_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; c = group a by all full, b by all; c = foreach c generate (case when sum(a['Amount']) / sum(b['QuotaAmount']) > 0 then sum(a['Amount']) / sum(b['QuotaAmount']) else 0 end) as 'sum_quota_attainment';

content.displayTemplate: Dive into your deals set to close for improved forecast accuracy.
